div.class: vc-hoverbox-wrapper vc_custom_1542558536746 vc-hoverbox-shape--rounded vc-hoverbox-align--center vc-hoverbox-direction--default vc-hoverbox-width--70

div.h2: The transnational platform of centres of vocational excellence for the emerging skills in Advanced Manufacturing

h4.span: Skillman is addressed to introduce skills, competences and innovative curricula for the advanced manufacturing sector within the VET pathways.
We connect industry and training providers with civil society and give support services that drive growth and effectiveness for our members

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-color-grey

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving-fade js-vc_parallax-o-fade

div.p: Skillman.eu was launched in 2014 and received the European Commission support in 2015 in the field of education and training. In its specific field of intervention it is currently became the largest EU multilateral networkcombining a solid knowledge of skills needs and training practices with a well organised systemic and sector-related information system.

div.style: background-position: top;background-repeat: repeat;background-attachment: scroll;background-size: auto;padding-top: 55px;padding-bottom: 20px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 50px; background:#EFEFEF;

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: The network was founded by well-known VET providers and industry leaders like Scandinavian Airline Systems, FIAT FCA, Jaguar Land Rover, the Italian National Research Centre, TKNIKA and other organisations and accreditations bodies from various EU countries.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Currently Skillman.eu is joined by regional, national and international organizations also based outside the EU, including new affiliated industries, notable universities and research centres as well NGOs, public bodies and other umbrella organisations, universities and training providers.
